name: GKMatchmakerViewControllerDelegate
desc: An object that handles when the status of matchmaking changes.

items.name: func matchmakerViewController(GKMatchmakerViewController, didFind: GKMatch)
items.desc: Handles when the view controller finds players for a peer-to-peer match.

items.name: func matchmakerViewController(GKMatchmakerViewController, didFindHostedPlayers: [GKPlayer])
items.desc: Handles when the view controller finds all requested players for a hosted match.

items.name: func matchmakerViewControllerWasCancelled(GKMatchmakerViewController)
items.desc: Handles when a player cancels a request to find players for a match.

items.name: func matchmakerViewController(GKMatchmakerViewController, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Handles when a view controller encounters an error while finding players for a match.

items.name: func matchmakerViewController(GKMatchmakerViewController, hostedPlayerDidAccept: GKPlayer)
items.desc: Handles when a player in a hosted match accepts the invitation.
